sentences.english: This science fiction film lends itself well to wide screen.

sentences.english: It is an amazing film which brings dinosaur alive on screen.

sentences.english: Gu Changwei first small films " bibcock " , flare outside big screen human brightness.

sentences.chinese: 他在銀幕上出現使其他戀物癖者在加利福尼亞州集會。

sentences.english: Mustafar was realized on screen through a combination of a wide variety of techniques.

sentences.english: The Image Hall is equipped with a 360 degree screen.

sentences.english: How did you recreate that bond on screen?
